extendedInfo.description: Event Organizer will help you to prepare your event in a simple and effective way.You will be able to create, export on Facebook or by e-mail an event and send invitations. Event Organizer comes with an icon gallery to define your event or you can take a picture.A special thanks to my friend Ryan Chang Lam for the icons.

reviews.title: Editing
reviews.comment: You can edit the tasks or guests by doing a long press event on the tasks or guests.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t allow you to edit tasks or guests.
reviews.author: A Google User
